name: merpaverse-manager
description: A plugin to help manage MERP servers. Includes "Dogelix's MERPaverse" combat system utils.
author: dogelix

only-authorized.description: Whether only authorized players can use commands

authorized-users.description: List of players who can always use commands

authorized-roles.description: List of roles who can always use commands

admin-roles.description: List of roles who can always use commands

cooldown.description: How long before users can re-run the command (seconds)

rpChatLogWebhookUrl.description: The Webhook URL to send RP message to discord

fileFileAlternateWebhookUrl.description: The Webhook URL to send RP message files to discord. Only used if uploadFiles is true. If null, rpChatLogWebhookUrl will be used instead.

uploadFiles.description: If true, the plugin will upload rp chat logs as files to the webhook instead of sending them as messages.

sendChatAsWellAsFiles.description: If true, the plugin will send chat messages to the webhook in addition to uploading them as files. ONLY APPLICABLE IF uploadFiles IS TRUE AND fileFileAlternateWebhookUrl IS SET.

rpChatLogTimeoutMins.description: The number of minutes to wait before sending RP chat logs to the webhook, even if the cache size has not been reached.

rpChatLogCacheSize.description: The number of RP chat logs to cache in memory before sending them to the webhook. Only applicable if uploadFiles is false. There will be a 5 minute timeout to send the logs even if the cache size is not reached.
